title: Oak Ridge Boys Take Their Impeccable Harmonies 'On The Road'
teaser: The Oak Ridge Boys are still at it, with a new CD of hymns and gospels called Rock of Ages. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to Joe Bonsall and Richard Sterban about Bonsall's new book and their latest CD.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
